abstract: NBC offered a brief preview of “The Jay Leno Show,” the network’s forthcoming 10 p.m. comedy program, during a presentation to advertisers in New York today.
snippet: NBC offered a brief preview of “The Jay Leno Show,” the network’s forthcoming 10 p.m. comedy program, during a presentation to advertisers in New York today.
lead_paragraph: NBC offered a brief preview of “The Jay Leno Show,” the network’s forthcoming 10 p.m. comedy program, during a presentation to advertisers in New York on Monday.
